column1: Uchi////The positive: free valet parking in the back; hip decor & nice ambiance; attentive service. Our waiter was very patient and explained everything on the menu for us. We appreciated when each plate was delivered
column2: another explanation of what was being served and how it was cooked were given. As soon as we finished a plate
column3: it was immediately removed by one of the staff. On the flip side
column4: that kind of made us feel like we were being constantly watched by their army of servers
column7: rushed. But we didn't mind it as much as the other negatives.
